mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Baby's Finger-Prints"; 01 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 17; "Baby's Finger-Prints"; Fingerprinting babies to keep their identity safe. Suggests that fingerprinting preserves and confirms someone's identity in situations of frauds and impostors. Describes example cases. Calls Herschel the originator, and mentions Galton, E.R. Henry, and Bertillon.; by Vincent Wray, Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Identification
